Job Title: Lead Mechanical Engineer

Location: Maitland, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Wright-Pierce, an award-winning, multi-discipline environmental engineering firm specializing in water, wastewater and civil infrastructure, is seeking a Lead Mechanical Engineer to join our company. The position entails a wide variety of challenging mechanical design projects requiring unique and creative approaches. This position can be located in our Maitland, FL or Tampa, FL offices.

Responsibilities

Designing and drafting HVAC equipment and accessories, and plumbing designs for water/wastewater treatment facilities. Preliminary Design Reports for HVAC and Plumbing disciplines. Reviewing all engineering calculations and design systems in accordance with established policies, standards, procedures, and code. Providing supervision and training to all junior to mid-level engineers and designers. Preparation, review and quality check of all plans and specifications for permitting, bidding and construction. Actively manage and schedule engineers and designers to meet all deadlines while maintaining quality design. Participate in project coordination with Electrical, Structural, Civil and Architectural disciplines. Coordinate and consult with others on design, layout and/or detail components and systems to resolve design issues or installation constraints. Undertake site surveys and field investigations, as needed, and develop drawings and reports for system installations and modifications. Support construction activities during RFI’s, submittal reviews, punch list and reports. 

Essential Skills

Strong written and verbal communication and interpersonal skillsStrong organizational and time management skillsAbility to build strong relationships with coworkersExcellent attention to detailUse Microsoft Teams to join/facilitate meetings with other teams/offices throughout the companyAbility to collaborate with other engineering disciplines, senior engineering and project management staff

Experience

8-10 years of experience, preferably in the water/wastewater fieldExperience with REVIT a plus

Certifications

Licensed Professional Engineer

Education 

BS Degree in Civil or Mechanical EngineeringMS Degree in Civil or Mechanical Engineering considered a plus

Equal Employment Opportunity 

Wright-Pierce is an EEO Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, national origin, gender, transgender, age, religion, disability, sexual orientation, veteran status, or marital status.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
